hero.intro: Hello, I'm Jos√© Ram√≠rez, a JR Front‚ÄëEnd developer from Luque, Paraguay.
hero.age: I am currently {{edad}} years old and in my third year majoring in Computer Science at Universidad Americana. I am a level C2 English speaker, which allows me to communicate, speak, develop code and write pretty well :).

projects.title: MERN Stack Store
projects.desc: An online store built with MongoDB, Express, React and Node.js. It's a prototype shop where users can browse products, add to cart and place orders.

projects.title: Minecraft Clone with React & Three.js
projects.desc: A web-based Minecraft clone using React and Three.js. Users can interact with game blocks, build structures and enjoy basic gameplay features.

projects.title: Travel Journal in Paraguay
projects.desc: A Paraguay travel journal highlighting tourist spots, gastronomy and cultural insights about the country.

projects.title: Tenzies Dice Game
projects.desc: A classic dice game built with React. Users roll dice and accumulate points in this fun implementation of Tenzies.

fastLearning.desc: I consider myself a fast learner, adapting quickly to new technologies and tools.

clearCommunication.desc: I'm assertive and an active listener, open to constructive feedback and suggestions.

itIntern.review: Beyond technical tasks, I gained Microsoft Office skills, learned collaborative work methodologies, improved my project organization abilities, and developed the diligence needed to fulfill assigned tasks.
itIntern.title: IT Intern
responsibilities: Learned Linux Bash and Powershell commands.
Installed, repaired, and configured desktop computers.
Collaborated in a team to solve technical issues.
Performed maintenance on RJ45 cables and connectors.
Developed and deepened my soft skills.

frontendApprentice.review: As a Front‚ÄëEnd Apprentice, I deepened my programming logic foundations, gained database work skills, and learned how software is developed in a real environment, collaborating closely with the team to deliver functional and scalable solutions.
frontendApprentice.title: Front‚ÄëEnd Apprentice
responsibilities: Learned Front‚ÄëEnd development fundamentals with React and TypeScript.
Collaborated on an internal Photo Gallery project.
Implemented agile development practices and version control with Git.
Understood the programming flow in a real setting, integrating components and APIs.
Leveraged AI trends to boost development efficiency.
Kept up with the latest web development trends and technologies.

hobbies.title: Reading
hobbies.description: I recently started reading books, I'm interested in technology, science fiction, Thrillers and novels.

hobbies.title: Going for Walks
hobbies.description: I like to go out and disconnect from the world. I don't do it much but I love it when I do.

favoriteGames.title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
favoriteGames.description: My all-time favorite Nintendo game. The soundtack is awesome, the world is massive and the gameplay is chef kiss. üíã

favoriteGames.title: Minecraft
favoriteGames.description: My childhood game. Binged-watched Minecraft videos on YouTube and played it for hours. It's my comfort game.

favoriteGames.title: Counter-Strike 2
favoriteGames.description: My favorite FPS of all time. My brother showed me this game back in the day that Cs 1.6 rocked. I was hooked instantly.

favoriteGames.title: Team Fortress 2
favoriteGames.description: Another childhood favorite. I loved the art style, the characters and the gameplay. It was a blast playing with friends.
